title: The Steam-driven adventures of Riverboat Bill
creator_credit: Phantascope, Film Victoria and Paul Williams
brief_description: Based on the Riverboat Bill books by Cliff Green. Riverboat Bill and young Dave Freshwater restore an old paddle-steamer, and, along with a fire breathing Bunyip and Black Ben the Pirate, have many adventures sailing the Murray River. Frank Thring Jr as the Bunyip’s voice.
